mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM TB_REVIEW R LEFT JOIN TB_PRODUCT_ORDER PO ON (R.ORDER_NO = PO.ORDER_NO) LEFT JOIN TB_OPTION OPT ON (PO.OPT_NO = OPT.OPT_NO) WHERE OPT.PROD_NO = #{prodNo} AND REV_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT R.REV_NO , R.REV_CONTENT , R.REV_ENROLL_DATE , R.REV_RATING , R.MEMBER_ID , OPT.OPT_NAME , OPT.OPT_VALUE FROM TB_REVIEW R LEFT JOIN TB_PRODUCT_ORDER PO ON (R.ORDER_NO = PO.ORDER_NO) LEFT JOIN TB_OPTION OPT ON (PO.OPT_NO = OPT.OPT_NO) WHERE OPT.PROD_NO = #{prodNo} ORDER BY REV_NO DESC
